titles.title: Providing for the consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 109) recognizing the duty of the Federal Government to create a Green New Deal.
Providing for the consideration of the resolution (H. Res. 109) recognizing the duty of the Federal Government to create a Green New Deal.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Hice (GA). Petition No: 116-2.

bill.summary: This resolution sets forth the rule for consideration of H.Res. 109 (calling for the creation of a Green New Deal with specified goals).
